document_data.name: the Wide Way
document_data.mainbody: The '''Wide Way''' was a street of corduroy-logs in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This street ran southeast off of [[Slipstone Street]], running roughly parallel to [[Nethpranter's Street]]. Along the way it intersected [[Quill Alley]] and eventually terminated at the [[Court of the White Bull]].

Notable Locations.Warehouse: A warehouse stood on one of the corners of where the Wide Way met Quill Alley. By [[1368 DR]], this warehouse was abandoned and its cellar was being used as a hidden temple to [[Loviatar]].<ref>
Notable Locations.The Zoarstar: Guildhall of the [[Scriveners', Scribes', & Clerks' Guild]], which stood on the northwest corner of where Quill Alley intersected with the Wide Way.
